# Project: 

## Canonical AI Documentation (SOURCE OF TRUTH)
The following documentation MUST be consulted when working on this project:

- Uniwind (styling system):
  https://docs.uniwind.dev/llms-full.txt

- HeroUI Native (UI components):
  https://v3.heroui.com/native/llms-full.txt

## Technology Stack
- React Native
- TypeScript
- Uniwind for styling
- HeroUI Native for UI components

## AI Agent Instructions
- Use HeroUI Native components whenever possible
- Use Uniwind exclusively for styling
- Do NOT recreate components already provided by HeroUI Native
- Do NOT use web-only HeroUI components
- Follow documented APIs only (no hallucinated props)

## Conflict Resolution
- If component structure and styling conflict, follow HeroUI Native component behavior and Uniwind styling conventions
